name: The Sexual Health Improvement Program (SHIP)
description: The Sexual Health Improvement Program (SHIP) provides a safe space for HIV-negative men, women, and transgender people to access sexual health services and tools like HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)—a daily pill that dramatically lowers the risk of HIV infection. SHIP offers: - Access to PrEP - HIV testing and counseling - Screening and treatment for STIs - Access to PEP - Sexual health counseling - Assistance with safe conception - Access to primary care (optional)

howToGetIt: Call our front desk at (415) 353-2119. If you are a new patient, please ask for the New Patient Coordinator.
